titles.title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 107 South Oak Street in Arcola, Illinois, as the "James E. Case IV Post Office".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 2/13/2002--Introduced. Designates the U.S. Postal Service facility located at 107 South Oak Street in Arcola, Illinois, as the James E. Case IV Post Office.
